desc: Handcrafted Jewellery, sculptural design inspired by the raw forms of nature and fused with the contemporary sophistication of man-made engineering. Rana Mikdashi Jewellery is the unbounded expression of eccentric spirit and perpetual style for Custom Necklace and Designer Silver Rings.

layout.text: Hand-crafted, sculptural design inspired by nature, culture, and limitless experimentation. Every piece is an unbounded expression of eccentric spirit and perpetual style.
